Contact us PageÂ¶

This page shows the user how they can reach the Girlscript Community. It consists of 2 sections which are as follows:

  1. The left section consists of the contact and the address details.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading : Go to contactUs.html and search def, you will see <h4> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the description : Go to contactUs.html and search def-sec, you will see <div> where you can make changes.

  • To modify the icon : Go to contactUs.html and search fa, you will see <i> tag where you can modify the class with your chosen icon.

  • To add any other information : Go to contactUs.html and search def , where you can copy the whole <div> and make changes accordingly.

  • To change the background image : Go to contact-page.css and search .main-section, in the url change the link to a different image. You can add new image in the ../assets/Images/contact/image_name and then add this link in the url.

  1. The right section consists of the contact form where the user can submit their queries.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading : Go to contactUs.html and search form-heading, you will see <h2> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the placeholder of the input field : Go to contactUs.html and search form-control-placeholder, where in <label> tag you can make changes.

  • To change the type of the input field : Go to contactUs.html and search form-control no-border, you will see <input> tag where in type you change it accordingly.

  • To add another input field : Go to contactUs.html and search form-group pb-3, where you can copy the whole <div> and make changes according to your requirement.

  • To modify the text in the button : Go to contactUs.html and search submit-button, you will see <button> tag where you can make changes.

  • To modify the validation of the input field : Go to contactUs.js and search validateForm and add the desired restrictions.

Note

  • You can refer this where you can get different icons according to your requirement and you can copy the html code of the icon to add it in the code and do the further designing.

  • To study about various input types in form refer this .

  • You can refer this for adding javascript form validation
